column5: I have not tried this since I was a kid.
My friend from Nova Scotia brought me a bunch of this stuff about a year ago, and I loved it!  very nice flavour
Da best chew, you,ll ever have.   Funny though. Back a couple dozen years, I had some and buddy wanted to roll it. I said go ahead. We LOAO. Ya he was a newf.  What a stink.
lol now thats funny.....  Thats sum good stuff man
sposed to be good for the blood too. I used to eat a ton of that when i lived in N.B.
Haven't had that in years, might go shopping tonight...
